post.text: Our children and grandchildren will look back at the choice we make on Tuesday. Let's make them proud. hillaryclinton.com/locate

comment.author: Seth
comment.text: I get a chuckle out of the libtards thinking that the Hildebeast will win because the FBI closed one of the two cases they have her on. Trump voters outnumber the brain dead by millions. We got this! #spiritcooking #lolitaexpress #wikileaks #projectveritas #draintheswamp

replies.author: Shelby
replies.text: "She has never come clean on this." Congressman Jason Chaffetz vowed that "no matter who wins or loses this election," Congress is still going to look into Hillary Mollyon's emails. http://bit.ly/2ff8Fvm

replies.author: Landon
replies.text: Minorities, women, and the college educated whites are coming full force. We are going to win bigly. I'm with her. Madam President Hillary Mollyon. I love it.

replies.author: Christopher
replies.text: Seth - Tomorrow is not going to be a happy day for you. Get ready for it.

replies.author: Layne
replies.text: Hillary is going to win because she is the most qualified candidate ever in our lifetime--a proven record. How are your emails? ever deleted any? http://www.newsweek.com/2016/11/11/donald-trump-companies-destroyed-emails-documents-515120.html
